item.title: CVE-2017-20008|2024-08-05T21:45:24.558Z -- unknown -- mycred%20%E2%80%93%20points%2C%20rewards%2C%20gamification%2C%20ranks%2C%20badges%20%26%20loyalty%20plugin
item.description: The myCred WordPress plugin before 1.7.8 does not sanitise and escape the user parameter before outputting it back in the Points Log admin dashboard, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
